Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndi kuphwanya pakati gulu la adani
Ndipo mwini wake amachitira umboni zimenezi
Ndithudi iye ali kukonda chuma kwambiri
Kodi iye sadziwa kuti pamene zonse zili m’manda zidzatulutsidwa ndi kuonetsedwa poyera
Ndithudi, patsiku limeneli, Ambuye wako adzakhala ali kudziwa chilichonse
